headline: Is Western Digital (WDC) One of the Best Aggressive Growth Stocks to Buy?
summary: Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) is one of the 15 Best Aggressive Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. On November 10, Loop Capital increased its price target on Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) from $190 to $250 while maintaining a Buy rating. Loop Capital expects demand for hard disk drive capacity to grow in 2025 and the […]
